product.product_title: Al Haramain Amber Oud Dubai Night | Oud & Amber Cologne for Men | Long-Lasting Scent with Bergamot & Saffron 60ml (2.0 oz)
product.product_description: Top Notes: This distinguished cologne opens with an invigorating blend of fresh bergamot, aromatic saffron, and resinous elemi. The combination creates a first impression that is both vibrantly fresh and intriguingly spicy, establishing a balanced and luxurious aura designed for the modern man. Middle Notes: At its heart, the fragrance reveals a harmonious blend where rich agarwood (oud) meets the delicate softness of Bulgarian rose and lily of the valley. This accord creates a deeply smooth and perfectly balanced core, characteristic of a refined men's cologne. Base Notes: The fragrance settles into a sophisticated base where clean white musk and sweet tonka bean intertwine with warm amber and earthy oakmoss. This foundation provides the oud perfume with a consistently smooth, elegant, and long-lasting finish. Long Lasting Perfume: Crafted for exceptional endurance, this is a truly long-lasting fragrance for men. It is engineered to maintain its bold character and aromatic presence reliably for hours, making it a steadfast and valuable addition to any men's cologne collection. Tradition Meets Innovation: At Al Haramain, tradition meets modern perfumery to create exceptional fragrances. From perfumes for women to men's fragrances, every detail is carefully crafted.
product.middle_notes: Agarwood (Oud), Bulgarian Rose, Lily of the Valley
product.base_notes: White Musk, Tonka Bean, Amber, Oakmoss
